name: PR_EST_PROMOTION_INFO
description: This table extracts promotion-related information that is present in the estimate.

columns.name: ESTIMATE_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the patient estimate record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: PROMOTION_ID
columns.description: The promotion records applied to the estimate.

columns.name: DISCOUNT_AMOUNT
columns.description: The flat discount amount associated with the promotion record at the time the promotion was added to the estimate.

columns.name: DISCOUNT_PERCENT
columns.description: The promotion discount percent at the time the promotion was applied to the estimate.

columns.name: OVERRIDE_DISCOUNT_AMOUNT
columns.description: The promotion discount amount if overridden by the user.

columns.name: OVERRIDE_DISCOUNT_PERCENT
columns.description: The discount percent amount if it was overridden by the user.
